name: NATIXIS
membership: ESBG & EACB (via BPCE), EBF through FBF, EFAMA (via Natixis Investment Management), Insurance Europe through FFA (via Natixis Assurances), AFEP, AMAFI, AFME, ISDA, ICMA.
goal:
Natixis is the international corporate and investment banking, asset management, insurance and financial services arm of Group BPCE, the second-largest banking group in France.

For more information refer to our website www.natixis.com
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Building capital market union, Action plan on building sustainable finance, ESA's review, Risk reduction package (CRDV, CRR2, BRRD2), Prudential Review for investment firms, Market infrastructure & EMIR regulation, Corporate Law, Fit & Proper, MIFID/MIFIR, MAR/MAD, PRIIPS, review of AIFMD,  Benchmark regulation & building a new Risk free rate, Review of Solvency II, Propose a plan on European Personal Pension Funds, EC proposal on cross border distribution of dunds
